title: Studio-Private guest house- in Shadow Hills
posting_body: ['Available September 1st', 'Great little single studio in the back .', 'Single person/ non smoking', 'fully furnished', 'street parking', 'nice neighborhood/safe', 'Near Burbank airport, 210 & 5 freeways ,restaurants and stores', 'kitchen sink, stove, oven, microwave & refrigerator', 'bathroom sink, toilet, shower stall', 'newly remodeled', 'Heating & Air', 'laundry washer /dryer', 'nearby in shed', 'all utilities paid', 'chickens and horses, in a historical L.A. setting', 'market, feed shop, and nice park in neighborhood', 'Please call for more information.', 'It’s tenant occupied now therefore please call to schedule a viewing.', 'Thank you', 'Eileen', 'show contact info', 'Requirements:', 'application and good credit', 'Monthly rent $1250', 'Security deposit $1250', '1.', 'Verifiable monthly income.', '2.', 'Good rental history.', '3.', 'Application fee is $30', 'key words: housing, home, los angeles, JPL, Disney,long term,91214,91011,91020,91202,91505, Glendale, Burbank, Pasadena, Los Angeles', 'apartments, rent, rental, short term, upgraded, renovated,Housing,corporate, executive, rental, short-term, short, filming, student, students, doctors, nurse, traveling, sales team,', 'CBRE L.A.
